## How to use
#### Select from the dropdown lists on the left hand side and click the Submit button
#### The inputs you selected along with a plot comparing the total number of survivors
#### and the survivors with the selected characteristics will be displayed.
####
#### The data for this analysis comes from Titanic dataset in the base R datasets package
